definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: nip, pinch (NH [[קָרַץ]] cut dough, compress lips, [[קֶרֶץ]] piece of bread; As. Karâṣu, nip off, gnaw, Ar. qaras.a pinch; Eth. qaras’a: incise; Syr.qriys.o0 nail [v. also BAram]; cf. Frä:35 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִקְרְחו־עַיִן]] Ps 35:19 let them not pinch the eye, i.e. wink maliciously, so Pt. act. ´[[קׂרֵץ ח]]: Pr 10:10, [[בְּעֵינוֹ]] ´[[ק]]: Pr 6:13; also [[שְׂפָתָיו]] ´[[ק]]: Pr 16:30 pinching his lips (i.e. compressing, as NH, or biting, gnawing, cf. As.).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[מֵחׂמֶר קׂרַחְתִּי]] Job 33:6 from clay I was nipped off (cf. As. ṭiṭaiḳtariṣ, he nipped off clay, to form Eabani).
